Huda Khayrallah

Project

ParaBank

Website

About

Huda is a PhD student in the Department of Computer Science at Johns Hopkins University, and a member of the Center for Language and Speech Processing at JHU. She received her B.A. in Computer Science in 2015 from UC Berkeley.
